modules package¶

Submodules¶

modules.arrays module¶

File: arrays.py

An Array is a restricted list whose clients can use only [], len, iter, and str.

To instantiate, use

<variable> = array(<capacity>, <optional fill value>)

The fill value is None by default.

class modules.arrays.Array(capacity, fillValue=None)¶

Bases: object

Represents an array.

class modules.arrays.ArrayExpanded(capacity, fillValue=None)¶

Bases: object

Represents an array.

grow()¶

Increases the physical size of the array if necessary.

insert(index, newItem)¶

Inserts item at index in the array.

pop(index)¶

Removes and returns item at index in the array. Precondition: 0 <= index < size()

shrink()¶

Decreases the physical size of the array if necessary.

size()¶

-> The number of items in the array.

modules.kanachar module¶

class modules.kanachar.KanaChar(char, sound, kana)¶

Bases: object

Class for representation of hiragana and katakana characters with their sounds, characters and kana values.

consonant()¶

Returns the consonant of the character sound. Example: gets ‘ka’ -> returns ‘k’ :return: str

vowel()¶

Returns vowel of the character sound. Example: gets ‘ka’ -> returns ‘a’ :return: str

modules.kanaset module¶

class modules.kanaset.KanaSet(chars)¶

Bases: object

Data structure based on ArrayExpanded data structure. Is used for working with KanaChar objects and their storage

charBySound(snd)¶

Returns a KanaChar with corresponding sound value. :param sound: str :return:KanaChar

getRandom()¶

Returns a random character from the KanaSet. :return: KanaChar

itemCount()¶

Returns the amount of items, not the actual length. :return: int

sameConsonant(cons)¶

Returns list of all KanaChar objects with corresponding consonant. :param cons: str :return: list

sameVowel(vow)¶

Returns list of all KanaChar objects with corresponding vowel. :param vow: str :return: list

soundByChar(chr)¶

Returns a sound str value of KanaChar with corresponding character value. :param chr: str :return: str

modules.kanaset.kanaSetUp(file, kanabool)¶

Sets up a KanaSet structure with data from a json file as KanaChar objects.

Works with json files structured like hiragana.json and katakana.json: {“alphabet”: [ {

“char_id”: “a”, “character”: “あ”, “romanization”: “a”

}, { … :param file: str :param kanabool: bool(True - hiragana, False - katakana) :return: KanaSet

modules.kanjiclass module¶

class modules.kanjiclass.Kanji(character, meanings, readings, parts_of_speech, radical)¶

Bases: object

Class for representation of a kanji character with all its information like the character itself, meanings, readings, which part of speech it is, its radicals.

commonRadical(other)¶

Tests if two Kanji objects have the same radical and returns corresponing bool value. :param other: Kanji :return: bool

commonSpeechPart(other)¶

Tests if two radicals are the same part of speech and gives corresponding bool value. :param other: Kanji :return: bool

getKunyomi()¶

Returns hiragana symbols of kunyomi reading of the kanji. :return: str

getOnyomi()¶

Returns katakana symbols of onyomi reading of the kanji. :return: str

modules.kanjiget module¶

modules.kanjiget.kanjiGetEng(word)¶

Gets an English word as an argument. Constructs a Kanji object based on data gathered from Kanji Alive API and Jisho.org API. :param kanji: str :return: Kanji

modules.kanjiget.kanjiGetJap(kanji)¶

Gets a kanji character as an argument. Constructs a Kanji object based on data gathered from Kanji Alive API and Jisho.org API. :param kanji: str :return: Kanji

modules.kanjiget.kanjiGet_J(url)¶

Helping function. Gets an API link for request. Returns json info about kanji from Jisho.org API. :param url: str :return: dict

modules.kanjiget.kanjiGet_KA(url)¶

Helping function. Gets an API link for request. Returns json info about kanji from Kanji Alive app database. :param url: str :return: dict

modules.kanjiset module¶

class modules.kanjiset.KanjiSet(kanjis=[])¶

Bases: object

Data structure for containing Kanji objects and working with them. Based on ArrayExpanded data structure

getRandom()¶

Returns a random kanji from the KanjiSet. :return: Kanji object
